name: Wonderoom
description:
Welcome to Wonderoom!

This is an experimental space where objects are not all what they seem. As you tamper with things, the environment shifts. Objects grow in size, stuff bends, things get weird.

An experiemental thesis showcase by Eden Blas.

How to Play: 

Explore the Wonderoom. Look at various things and click on them. Something might just happen.

Controls:

  • WASD to Walk.
  • Spacebar to Jump.
  • Right Mouse Button to Zoom In/Zoom Out
  • Left Mouse Button to click.
